title: Customer Accounts & Authentication
intent: Enable customers to securely log in, see personalized data, and manage their subscription.

title: Design customer account model
description: Define the schema for customers including email, name, hashed password, subscription hours, and scheduling permissions.

title: Implement authentication UI
description: Add login, logout, and registration UI on thehousefinch.com.
acceptance: Users can log in and log out

title: Secure customer API endpoints
description: Protect backend endpoints so only authenticated users can fetch their own subscription hours and appointments.
acceptance: Authenticated user sees only their data

title: Banked Hours Tracking
intent: Track purchased and consumed hours for customers and reflect balance in UI.

title: Build banked hours ledger
description: Implement backend logic to track hours purchased, hours consumed by appointments, and remaining balance.

title: Display balance in customer dashboard
description: Show remaining hours in the logged-in customer’s dashboard.

title: Web Scheduling Interface
intent: Allow customers to select appointment times and durations based on their available hours.

title: Design scheduling calendar UI
description: Create a calendar component where customers can choose available dates and times.

title: Integrate scheduling with hours ledger
description: Prevent booking times that exceed the customer’s available hours.
acceptance: Cannot book more hours than available

title: Persist bookings in database
description: Store each booking with customer ID, time, and duration.

title: Staff Notification System
intent: Notify House Finch staff when a booking is created, modified, or canceled.

title: Choose notification channels
description: Decide whether to use email, SMS, or dashboard alerts for staff.

title: Implement notification dispatch
description: Send notifications when appointments are scheduled or changed.

title: Payments & Purchasing More Hours
intent: Enable customers to buy additional hours easily through the website.

title: Integrate payment processor
description: Connect Stripe or another payment provider for purchasing hours.

title: Credit hours after purchase
description: Add purchased hours to customer’s banked balance automatically.

title: Staff Dashboard
intent: Provide internal view for House Finch staff to manage schedules and view customer balances.

title: Design dashboard UI
description: Create a dashboard showing upcoming appointments and customer info.

title: Implement staff view endpoints
description: Create backend endpoints for staff to retrieve all bookings and balances.

title: Replace Connecteam for Scheduling Workflows
intent: Retire reliance on Connecteam for customer scheduling and hours tracking.

title: Audit current Connecteam workflows
description: Map how scheduling and notifications currently work in Connecteam.

title: Migrate scheduling off Connecteam
description: Stop using Connecteam for core customer scheduling features.
